boat.full_description:
'Young Larry' is named after one of her designer, Dick Couture's, earlier boats named 'Larry', and also in the OGA Boat Register,

'Young Larry' has a steel hull built by Terry Erskine in Gozo, Malta, with fit-out completed by designer and first owner Dick Couture. Completed 1995 she has cruised in the Eastern Mediterranean and Turkish waters.

Kept in Palma for a number of years 'Young Larry' was sold 2009 to new owners who took her through the Northwest Passage in 2010 and completed the circumnavigation of North America in 2011.  She is now based in Western Scotland.
boat.name: Young Larry
boat.short_description: Young Larry is named after Larry, a boat previously owned by her designer Dick Couture. Built of steel, she has sailed in the Mediterranean and also done the Northwest Passage.
